this_title: The Search for Life: The Drake Equation
introduction: For many years our place in the universe was the subject of theologians and philosophers, not scientists, but in 1960 one man changed all that.Dr Frank Drake was one of the leading lights in the new science of radio astronomy when he did something that was not only revolutionary, but could have cost him his career. Working at the National Radio Astronomy Observatory in Greenba...
